name: Offroad Extreme Raptor Drive – 3D Race
description:
Chance to experience the thrill of driving raptor monster truck in 2017?

Ever wanted to try a sports raptor jeep simulation game? Now you can drive, drift and feel racing in a monster truck like sports car in 2017. Burn up the street with the fastest and most visually stunning Offroad Extreme Raptor Drive game introduce by Game Sim Studios. This game rally lets you drive the fun of controlling a big luxury vehicle in mountains. This offroad game requires extraordinary driving skills from driver who know how to control heavy off road vehicle like 4x4 offroad cars, moto racing and 6x6 jeeps. Prepare yourself for this new 2017 cruiser model. Use your best driving skills to beat the most mind blowing track in this physics base simulation game.
http://kaizentechstudio.com/
https://www.facebook.com/kaizentechstudio/
